stickers.name: ceobe_happy
stickers.alt: Ceobe leans toward her hands clasped together in a gesture of cooing over something lovely.

stickers.name: ceobe_nap
stickers.alt: Ceobe curls up and naps on a couch.

stickers.name: ceobe_sticks
stickers.alt: Ceobe carries a bundle of staves on her back that is nearly twice her height. She is visibly sweating and struggling with carrying the weight.

stickers.name: nightmare_despair
stickers.alt: Gloria (Nightmare's nice personality) fearfully huddles in a corner, crying and sweating as she clasps her hands together like she's praying for help.

stickers.name: leizi_angry
stickers.alt: Leizi grits her teeth in anger. There's a shadow over her eyes as they glint and lightning emitting from her fist in a promise of revenge.

stickers.name: leizi_static
stickers.alt: Leizi is in the middle of shaking Amiya's hand, causing Amiya's hair to poof from an excessive amount of static electricity.

stickers.name: leizi_charge
stickers.alt: Leizi points toward Closure's phone, zapping it. Closure looks offended.

stickers.name: durnar_suitcase
stickers.alt: Dur-nar smugly shows off the contents of her suitcase by hold it open. Inside is presumably the wares of her secret underground snack network.

stickers.name: beehunter_defeat
stickers.alt: Beehunter sits slumped over on a stool, smiling sadly. Her posture depicts her as worn out or defeated.

stickers.name: indra_punchscreen
stickers.alt: Indra just punched a hole through a desktop monitor. Her right fist peeks out from the back as the monitor emits smoke.

stickers.name: gitano_death
stickers.alt: Gitano, with an angry glint in her one visible eye, throws a card with the Roman numberal for thirteen, referencing the Death tarot card. The card pierces the Doctor's helmet (and presumably their head), causing blood to gush out.

stickers.name: skyfire_dusty
stickers.alt: Skyfire props her head up on her left elbow. She looks bored as she holds her staff in her right arm, her head is covered in dust and a cobweb sits between her head and her staff.

stickers.name: vulcan_disgust
stickers.alt: Vulcan holds up a molten piece of heart-shaped metal with her blacksmith tongs. She looks mildly disgusted and confused as she holds her hammer in her right hand.

stickers.name: hellagur_nap
stickers.alt: Hellagur sits in a chair, his eyes closed as he enjoys the peace. A cat with the same color scheme as Aak sits in his lap, his left hand on its back. A bat with the same color scheme as Warfarin sits on his shoulder.

stickers.name: meteor_praise
stickers.alt: Meteor blushes as she holds her right hand to her cheek, basking in Doctor's praise. She holds a bow in her left hand and a blindfold is wrapped around her eyes. Behind her is the Doctor, both hands raised above their head in fists as they cheer. An apple sits on the Doctor's head with three arrows having pierced through it.

stickers.name: frostleaf_phone
stickers.alt: Frostleaf holds a rotary phone to her right ear with both hands. Her expression is a mix of confusion and mild fear.
